description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Guns N Noses is a fun third person shooter with cartoon style characters. You can choose between different male or female characters with specific attributes and customize their appearance. Select a tour in the Wild West and eliminate all the outlaws you find on your journey increasing your abilities throughout the game. Play alone or in co-op mode with up to 4 local players.
